name: LafargeHolcim Ltd
membership: The main organisations that LafargeHolcim adheres to include: Cembureau, EUPG, ERMCO, Eucopro, Globe EU, IETA, ERT, ECRA, AECA.
goal: Founded in 2015 by the merger of Lafarge and Holcim, LafargeHolcim is the world's most advanced group in the building material industry. We provide innovative cement, aggregates ready-mix concrete and asphalt products, as well as associated services and solutions. LafargeHolcim is a global company employing 81000 employees across 80 countries.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: LH follows the activities of the EU institutions principally relating to climate change energy, circular economy and environment (incl. waste, biodiversity and industrial emissions). Specific initiatives followed include: com (2013) 919, com (2014) 397, com (2014) 398, com (2014) 445, com (2014) 020, com (2015) 337, 2015/0275, 2016/0376, 2016/0381, 2018/0178 (COD)
